title: Champion Mastery kills my frames
body: Whenever I use my champion mastery my frames will drop from over 100 to 0. It doesn't do it when anyone else uses theirs. If anyone has a solution I'd be super happy and grateful so I can continue my gloating without dying immediately after.

replies.body: Thanks for the tip, but my problems are still there. The whole game just freezes for a second or two.

This may be caused by missing or corrupted assets for the animation. I recommend running a quick repair of your game files by hitting the cog icon in the top-right corner of the client to access the repair initialization button.

Let me know if your symptoms persist through the repair.
